item.title: Lisa add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Peace cannot be achieved through violence, it can only be attained through understanding." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Jawaharlal Nehru
item.description: "The forces in a capitalist society, if left unchecked, tend to make the rich richer and the poor poorer." -- Jawaharlal Nehru

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Anais Nin
item.description: "How wrong is it for a woman to expect the man to build the world she wants, rather than to create it herself?" -- Anais Nin

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Christopher Hitchens
item.description: "We keep on being told that religion, whatever its imperfections, at least instills morality. On every side, there is conclusive evidence that the contrary is the case and that faith causes people to be more mean, more selfish, and perhaps above all, more stupid." -- Christopher Hitchens

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Toba Beta
item.description: "If you're betrayed, release disappointment at once. By that way, the bitterness has no time to take root." -- Toba Beta

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Leo Tolstoy
item.description: "All happy families are alike; each unhappy family is unhappy in its own way." -- Leo Tolstoy

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Jarod Kintz
item.description: "One of my main regrets in life is giving considerable thought to inconsiderate people." -- Jarod Kintz
